title: >>> Dodgeball DATA II
body_text:
For those familiar with "Dodgeball DATA" back around the time of DODGEBALL 30, this is nothing new. For those unaware, "Dodgeball DATA" is a small compialation of records, facts, stats, etc. about numerous past events and the players themselves.
> "Most Events Played"
1. Diana DiBuccio (37)
2. Steve Adams (36)
3. Chris Adams (35)
4. Justin Pierce (33)
4. Dan Spengeman (33)
6. Valerie Winston (31)
6. Lauren Freda (31)
8. Mike "Sputz" Krott (30)*
9. Lenny Herrera (29)
10. Kevin Adams (28)
*Even after 30 times, Mike "Sputz" has not once been captain for an event.
> "Longest String of Events":
1. Lenny Herrera (29 events in a row) [DODGEBALL XONE to Present]*
2. Justin Pierce (26 events in a row) [DAY 2 to DODGEBALL 27]
3. Steve Adams (22 events in a row) [DAY 2 to DODGEBALL 23]
4. Dan Spengeman (21 events in a row) [DAY 3 to DODGEBALL 23]
5. Diana DiBuccio (19 events in a row) [DAY 1 to DODGEBALL 19]
5. Chris Adams (19 events in a row) [DAY 3 to DODGEBALL 21]
7. Tom Adams (17 events in a row) [DODGEBALL 8 to DODGEBALL XXIV]
7. Mike "Sputz" Krott (17 events in a row) [DODGEBALL 19 to DODGEBALL 35]
*Lenny Herrera has never missed an event since his debut at DODGEBALL XONE on November 4th, 2005.
> As of DODGEBALL 39: 106 men + 41 women = 147 players total
> The first player alphabetically (using first names) used to be Aimee Savoth. However, that has changed ever since DODGEBALL 38 when Adam Kaufman made his debut. The last person is still Zach Katz.
> "Matt" is the most popular name in dodgeball with eight. "John" is in a close second with six. "Lauren" remains the top female name with three.
> "Most Times Captain": Valerie Winston, Lauren Winston, John Tronolone, and Steve Adams have all been captain four times.
Valerie Winston: Captain at 1, 2*, VII, 8
Lauren Winston: Captain at 1, 2*, 21, 27
John Tronolone: Captain at 9, 20, 30, 35
Steve Adams: Captain at X, TWENTY-SIX, XXVIII, XXX-SEVEN
*
Only believed to have been captain at that event
> Family Feuds:
- Valerie Winston vs. Lauren Winston (DAY 1 and DAY 2*)
- Steve Adams vs. Kevin Adams (DODGEBALL X)
- Steve Adams vs. Chris Adams (DODGEBALL XXVIII)
*
Only believed to have been captain at that event
> There have been three "Same Name" Captains matches:
- Dan Karen vs. Dan Spengeman (DODGEBALL 13)
- Lauren Winston vs. Lauren Freda (DODGEBALL 27)
- Robert Brown vs. Darien Brown (DODGEBALL 33)
> The player who was captain the most during "Season 4" was Joe Kelly. He was captain at consecutive events DODGEBALL 38 and DODGEBALL 39, and won both much to his credit.
> Highest Attendances:
1. DODGEBALL XTWO = 42 players [11/05/05]
2. DODGEBALL 15 = 37 players [11/26/05]
2. DODGEBALL 20 = 37 players [12/30/05]
4. DODGEBALL 30 = 34 players [03/12/06]
4. DODGEBALL 33 = 34 players [04/01/06]
> Lowest Attendances:
1. DODGEBALL DAY 1 = 12 players [09/02/05]
1. DODGEBALL XXX-ONE = 12 players [03/18/06]
1. DODGEBALL 36 = 12 players [04/22/06]
4. DODGEBALL TWENTY-SIX = 14 players [02/11/06]
5. DODGEBALL VII = 15 players [10/08/05]
> "Wet War" History:
1. DODGEBALL VII [10/08/05]
2. DODGEBALL 9 [10/22/05]
3. DODGEBALL TWENTY-TWO [01/14/06]
4. DODGEBALL XXV [02/04/06]
5. DODGEBALL TWENTY-SIX [02/11/06]
6. DODGEBALL 30 [03/12/06]
7. DODGEBALL 32 [03/25/06]
8. DODGEBALL 36 [04/22/06]
> "Season 4" saw many changes whether it was location or game-type:
- DODGEBALL XXX-ONE: Prison Ball
- DODGEBALL 33: Back Courts of the Wall High School Tennis courts as well as "Human Rims".
- DODGEBALL 38: Captain Dodgeball
- DODGEBALL 39: "The Kevin Megill Memorial" (aka Dodgeball Battle Royal)
> Theme songs are a major part of the "ten" events:
- DODGEBALL X: Staind "Mudshovel"
- DODGEBALL 20: Filter "Hey Man, Nice Shot"
- DODGEBALL 30: Van Halen "Right Now"
The theme song for DODGEBALL XL is Metallica's "Fuel" from their
ReLoad
CD.
There is still plenty more to come during the week in preparation for DODGEBALL XL. Check back soon!

For those familiar with "Dodgeball DATA" back around the time of DODGEBALL 30, this is nothing new. For those unaware, "Dodgeball DATA" is a small compialation of records, facts, stats, etc. about numerous past events and the players themselves.

> "Most Events Played"
1. Diana DiBuccio (37)
2. Steve Adams (36)
3. Chris Adams (35)
4. Justin Pierce (33)
4. Dan Spengeman (33)
6. Valerie Winston (31)
6. Lauren Freda (31)
8. Mike "Sputz" Krott (30)*
9. Lenny Herrera (29)
10. Kevin Adams (28)

*Even after 30 times, Mike "Sputz" has not once been captain for an event.

> "Longest String of Events":
1. Lenny Herrera (29 events in a row) [DODGEBALL XONE to Present]*
2. Justin Pierce (26 events in a row) [DAY 2 to DODGEBALL 27]
3. Steve Adams (22 events in a row) [DAY 2 to DODGEBALL 23]
4. Dan Spengeman (21 events in a row) [DAY 3 to DODGEBALL 23]
5. Diana DiBuccio (19 events in a row) [DAY 1 to DODGEBALL 19]
5. Chris Adams (19 events in a row) [DAY 3 to DODGEBALL 21]
7. Tom Adams (17 events in a row) [DODGEBALL 8 to DODGEBALL XXIV]
7. Mike "Sputz" Krott (17 events in a row) [DODGEBALL 19 to DODGEBALL 35]

*Lenny Herrera has never missed an event since his debut at DODGEBALL XONE on November 4th, 2005.

> As of DODGEBALL 39: 106 men + 41 women = 147 players total

> The first player alphabetically (using first names) used to be Aimee Savoth. However, that has changed ever since DODGEBALL 38 when Adam Kaufman made his debut. The last person is still Zach Katz.

> "Matt" is the most popular name in dodgeball with eight. "John" is in a close second with six. "Lauren" remains the top female name with three.

> "Most Times Captain": Valerie Winston, Lauren Winston, John Tronolone, and Steve Adams have all been captain four times.
Valerie Winston: Captain at 1, 2*, VII, 8
Lauren Winston: Captain at 1, 2*, 21, 27
John Tronolone: Captain at 9, 20, 30, 35
Steve Adams: Captain at X, TWENTY-SIX, XXVIII, XXX-SEVEN
*Only believed to have been captain at that event

*Only believed to have been captain at that event

> There have been three "Same Name" Captains matches:
- Dan Karen vs. Dan Spengeman (DODGEBALL 13)
- Lauren Winston vs. Lauren Freda (DODGEBALL 27)
- Robert Brown vs. Darien Brown (DODGEBALL 33)

> The player who was captain the most during "Season 4" was Joe Kelly. He was captain at consecutive events DODGEBALL 38 and DODGEBALL 39, and won both much to his credit.

> Highest Attendances:
1. DODGEBALL XTWO = 42 players [11/05/05]
2. DODGEBALL 15 = 37 players [11/26/05]

4. DODGEBALL 33 = 34 players [04/01/06]

> Lowest Attendances:

1. DODGEBALL XXX-ONE = 12 players [03/18/06]
1. DODGEBALL 36 = 12 players [04/22/06]

5. DODGEBALL VII = 15 players [10/08/05]

> "Wet War" History:

2. DODGEBALL 9 [10/22/05]
3. DODGEBALL TWENTY-TWO [01/14/06]
4. DODGEBALL XXV [02/04/06]
5. DODGEBALL TWENTY-SIX [02/11/06]
6. DODGEBALL 30 [03/12/06]
7. DODGEBALL 32 [03/25/06]
8. DODGEBALL 36 [04/22/06]

> "Season 4" saw many changes whether it was location or game-type:
- DODGEBALL XXX-ONE: Prison Ball
- DODGEBALL 33: Back Courts of the Wall High School Tennis courts as well as "Human Rims".
- DODGEBALL 38: Captain Dodgeball
- DODGEBALL 39: "The Kevin Megill Memorial" (aka Dodgeball Battle Royal)

> Theme songs are a major part of the "ten" events:
- DODGEBALL X: Staind "Mudshovel"
- DODGEBALL 20: Filter "Hey Man, Nice Shot"
- DODGEBALL 30: Van Halen "Right Now"
The theme song for DODGEBALL XL is Metallica's "Fuel" from their ReLoad CD.


There is still plenty more to come during the week in preparation for DODGEBALL XL. Check back soon!
